name: DEAD SYNCHRONICITY: TCT - A dark point and click adventure
blurb: Old-school 2D graphic adventure game featuring space-time distortions, a dystopian atmosphere... and a dark, bloodstained plot.

rewards.reward: No Reward
THANKS TIME \r\n=============================  Our deepest gratitude + Set of HD wallpapers + Your nick/name included in the final credits... and written on our "Thank you wall" at our office!
EARLY BIRD GAME TIME ============================= Previous rewards + Full game as a digital download, completely DRM-free for PC or Mac. Limited to the fastest 200 backers!

GAME TIME ============================= Previous rewards + Full game as a digital download, completely DRM-free for PC or Mac + Access to press releases, so that you get the information about the game sooner than anyone!

OPTION TIME ============================= Previous rewards + CHOOSE BETWEEN:

a) Digital downloadable soundtrack by Kovalski

OR 

b) Digital downloadable book "The art of Dead Synchronicity"

(We'll ask you once the campaign is finished)

MUSIC & BOOK & BETA TIME ============================= Previous rewards + Digital downloadable soundtrack by Kovalski +  Digital downloadable book "The art of Dead Synchronicity" + Early access to alphas and betas
AZPIRI TIME ============================= Previous rewards + Printed Azpiri's poster, A2 size (23.4 x 16.5 in / 594 x 420 mm)
SIGNED AZPIRI TIME ============================= Previous rewards.... and the poster will be signed by Alfonso Azpiri himself!
BOXED GAME TIME ============================= Previous rewards + Physical boxed edition of "Dead Synchronicity: Tomorrow comes Today" (choose sleeve preference: standard or Azpiri's)

ALL-DIGITAL & IN-GAME NAME TIME ============================= \r\nNEW!!! Previous DIGITAL rewards (game, soundtrack, artbook, access to alphas-betas and press releases, wallpapers, your name in the "Thank you wall" and in the final credits\u2026 so NO PHYSICAL REWARDS) + Get yourself in the plot of "Dead Synchronicity: Tomorrow comes Today": your name will be featured in a surprising in-game list\u2026 (Please be aware that the next tier including your name in an in-game list is the $275 one, which includes a lot of physical rewards. Check our rewards table!)

ALL-DIGITAL & IN-GAME PROFILE TIME =============================\r\nNEW!!! Previous DIGITAL rewards (game, soundtrack, artbook, access to alphas-betas and press releases, wallpapers, your name in the "Thank you wall" and in the final credits\u2026 so NO PHYSICAL REWARDS) + Get yourself in the plot of "Dead Synchronicity: Tomorrow comes Today"\u2026 in depth: a detailed profile of yourself (including name, bio and photograph) (Please, be aware that the next tier including an in-game profile of yourself is the $400 one, which includes a lot of physical rewards... and a digital portrait of yourself!!! Check our rewards table!)

ART TIME ============================= Previous rewards + CD soundtrack by Kovalski + Printed art book "The art of Dead Synchronicity" + Standard A2 printed poster... everything signed by their authors: Azpiri, Fictiorama & Kovalski.... Long live autographs!
THE DISSOLVED TIME ============================= Previous rewards + Mysterious labeled pot containing the alleged remains of a dissolved... Choose the name on the label!

IN-GAME NAME TIME ============================= Previous rewards + Get yourself in the plot of "Dead Synchronicity: Tomorrow comes Today": your name will be featured in an in-game list. Wait to see what that list is about!

CARTOON & IN-GAME PROFILE TIME ============================= Previous rewards + Get yourself in the plot of "Dead Synchronicity: Tomorrow comes Today"... in depth: a detailed profile of yourself (including name, bio and photograph) inside the game + "Dead Synchronicity" style, PRINTED portrait of yourself (or the person in the photograph you send us): A2 or A3 size, as you prefer

3D MICHAEL TIME ============================= Previous rewards + Collection of original, limited, numbered art drafts, signed by our artist + Exclusive highly detailed 3D sculpt of Michael (3,54 in / 9 cm tall)
IN-GAME CHARACTER TIME ============================= Previous rewards + Be an active asset in "Dead Synchronicity: Tomorrow comes Today": you will become a character in the game!

GIG TIME ============================= Previous rewards + Exclusive gig of Kovalski... just for you! (Only in Madrid or via Skype) + Your name featured in a prominent place during the intro of the game

STUDIO TIME ============================= Previous rewards + Enjoy a day at our studio (travel cost and lodging not included... but we will buy you an splendid lunch!) + Your name in an even more prominent place during the intro of the game

ORIGINAL AZPIRI TIME ============================= Previous rewards + UNIQUE original hand-made "Dead Synchronicity" illustration by Azpiri himself. A once in a lifetime item... and, of course, there is just ONE available, the one and only! (If you happen to be so marvelous that you want Azpiri's original unique illustration plus any other more expensive reward... hurry up: pick this one and then contact us!)

INTERNSHIP TIME ============================= Previous rewards (except original hand-made Azpiri illustration) + Spend a week with us (you, or whoever you choose) learning how we develop adventures! (Travel cost and lodging not included)

SPAIN IS DIFFERENT TIME ============================= Previous rewards (except original hand-made Azpiri's illustration)... and come to Madrid and meet us! Paid trip to Madrid + 3 nights stay in a luxury hotel + Tickets to watch a soccer match at the Madrid stadium you prefer (Real Madrid at Bernab\u00e9u, Atl\u00e9tico de Madrid at Calder\u00f3n). If you don't like soccer... we can take you to Expocomic (the biggest comic expo in Madrid) or Madrid Games Week (the most important video game event in Madrid) instead!
